name: TextDrawSetSelectable
warnings: TextDrawSetSelectable must be used BEFORE the textdraw is shown to players for it to be selectable.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3e and will not work in earlier versions!
tips: Use TextDrawTextSize to define the clickable area.
description: Sets whether a textdraw can be selected (clicked on) or not

params_body.name: text
params_body.description: The ID of the textdraw to make selectable.

params_body.name: set
params_body.description: 1 to make it selectable, or 0 to make it not selectable.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
SelectTextDraw: Enables the mouse, so the player can select a textdraw
 CancelSelectTextDraw: Cancel textdraw selection with the mouse
 OnPlayerClickTextDraw: Called when a player clicks on a textdraw.
related_cb: OnPlayerClickTextDraw: Called when a player clicks on a textdraw.
